entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Bracebridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:51 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 11:46 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.8°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -15.0°C
Wind: SSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 7:07 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 7:07 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 7:07 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
